message.content: {"id": "15899", "title": "Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time", "description": "", "OB": "When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' option does not work consistently. To reproduce the issue: 1. Close all editors. 2. Create a new file named f1.txt. 3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. 4. Notice that nothing happens.", "EB": "The expected behavior is that the 'Close All Saved' option should close the file f1.txt since no changes have been made to it.", "SR": "Investigate and fix the issue with the 'Close All Saved' option to ensure it consistently closes all saved files when no changes have been made."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
